summary: This is a brief email from an FBI forensic accountant at the New York Field Office, indicating they will soon provide an American Express (AMEX) production regarding Ghislaine Maxwell. It demonstrates ongoing financial investigation into Maxwell's activities as of January 2020.

persons.name: G. Maxwell
persons.context: The email states that an AMEX production regarding her will be provided, indicating she is the subject of a financial records request.

events.title: FBI Forensic Accountant Prepares AMEX Production
events.description: An FBI forensic accountant emails colleagues stating they will shortly leave the American Express production regarding Ghislaine Maxwell for them.

locations.name: FBI New York Field Office
locations.context: The office of the sender, a forensic accountant working on the Maxwell case.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively obtaining and analyzing Ghislaine Maxwell's American Express financial records as of January 2020.
The communication originates from a forensic accountant at the FBI New York Field Office, indicating a financial investigation track.
The document is a direct communication about evidence collection in the Maxwell investigation.
